Package it.polimi.se2019.commons.vc_events

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CalculatePointsEvent
    Event sent when the match is over in order to allow the DeathController to calculate the points at the end of the match.
    ChosenComboEvent
    This event is sent from the user in order to communicate the combo (eg: Run Around, Shoot People, Grab Stuff,...) they wish to use.
    ChosenEffectEvent
    This event communicates the effect of the chosen weapon the user wishes to use.
    ChosenEffectPowerUpEvent
    This event is used to communicate the chosen power up effect the user wishes to apply.
    ChosenWeaponEvent
    This event communicates the chosen weapon to use amongst those owned by the user and reloaded.
    DiscardedPowerUpEvent
    This event communicates the power up the user wishes to discard.
    DiscardedWeaponEvent
    This event communicates the weapon the user wishes to discard.
    DisconnectionEvent
    This event notifies the disconnection or reconnection of a user during the game.
    GrabEvent
    This event communicates the card the user decided to grab.
    PowerUpUsageEvent
    This event communicates that the user wishes to use a power up they own.
    ReloadEvent
    This event communicates that the user wishes to reload the listed weapons.
    SpawnEvent
    This event allows the player to spawn on a spawn tile of the same colour of the discarded power up.
    VCCardEndEvent
    This event is sent from the view when receiving a MVWeaponEndEvent.
    VCChooseAmmoToPayEvent
    This event is sent when a user decides which ammo to use to pay when using a power up that requires a payment.
    VCEndOfTurnEvent
    This event is sent to the Controller when a user wishes to end their turn before the possible actions they can do are over.
    VCFinalFrenzy  
    VcJoinEvent
    This event is sent when a new user joins match making.
    VcMatchConfigurationEvent
    This event is sent when a user sends their preferred playing options in the set up phase.
    VCMoveEvent
    This event is sent when a user moves its player.
    VCPartialEffectEvent
    This event is sent when a user is using a weapon or a power up effect and they choose who to apply the effect to.
    VcReconnectionEvent
    This event is sent upon reconnection of a user.
    VCSellPowerUpEvent
    This event is sent when a user chooses the power ups they wish to sell in order to pay for the price of an action.
    VCWeaponEndEvent
    This event is sent when a weapon usage is over.
